definition: to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)

sentences.english: Optical Imaging and Aberrations, Part II. Wave Diffraction Optics
sentences.chinese: 光學成像和失常，第二部分。波衍射光學

sentences.english: The zero-offset (z0) section is an important achievement in seismic reflection imaging.
sentences.chinese: 零炮檢距剖面是地震反射成像過程中的重要成果。

sentences.english: SPECT imaging will demonstrate decreased radiotracer uptake in the frontal and temporal lobes.
sentences.chinese: SPECT成像顯示額顳葉放射性攝取減低。

sentences.english: The signals create images of your heart that can help your doctor determine the cause of your heart arrhythmia.
sentences.chinese: 通過檢測信號就可以對心臟成像並幫助醫生推測病因。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss adhesive ileus features of multi-slice spiral CT imaging.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討粘連性腸梗阻的多層螺旋CT成像特徵。

sentences.english: The effects of the optical beam width and cladding on imaging are analysed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了光束束寬和包層對成像的影響。

sentences.english: Vibrating mirror, light writing device, and image forming apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 振動鏡，光寫設備，以及成像裝置。

sentences.english: First and foremost, we needto develop better tests that don't require expensive imaging.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我們要發展更好的花費少的成像檢查。

sentences.english: This makes it possible to research the polarization in a ferroelectric substance by HRTEM.
sentences.chinese: 這是利用高分辨成像研究位移型鐵電體極化的基礎。

sentences.english: Functional magnetic resonance imaging of activity in the subjects' brains hints at a possible explanation.
sentences.chinese: 受試者的大腦活動的核磁共振成像暗示着一個解釋。

sentences.english: Double-pass imaging polarimetry in the human eye.
Both techniques delineated the location of occlusion in all patients.
sentences.chinese: 兩種成像技術顯示了所有病人胰膽管梗阻部位。

sentences.english: X-ray digital imaging testing technology is a new method of nondestructive testing.
sentences.chinese: 射線數字成像檢測是工業無損檢測的新技術。

sentences.english: And semiconductor laser non-scanning imaging system was focused on in the research.
sentences.chinese: 本論文主要對半導體激光非掃描成像系統進行了研究。

sentences.english: The analysis of the image quality on focus plate is very important in infrared seeker measurement.
sentences.chinese: 焦面上的成像質量分析是紅外導引頭測試的重要內容。

sentences.english: In this system, the image of the holes on the spinneret were zoomed in and stored for post-processing.
sentences.chinese: 該系統通過顯微鏡對噴絲孔進行放大成像並採集保存。
